entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clinton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clinton 12:52 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.0°C
Pressure: 103.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -15.1°C
Wind: WNW 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
